Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 37-40 In search of new acceptor moieties , we designed an interesting structure of N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]-pentalene-4,6-dione ( DTPD ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]-pentalene-4,6-dione |
| DTPD |

In this paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]-pentalene-4,6-dione" and "DTPD". The first one is the full chemical name of the structure being designed, and the second one is an abbreviation for the same material.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]-pentalene-4,6-dione |

In this revised list, the only clear "Material Name" entity is "N-octyl-2,7-dithia-5-azacyclopenta[a]-pentalene-4,6-dione". The abbreviation "DTPD" is not included because it is not clear what it stands for without additional context.
